categories.name: Charms
categories.description: Charms are cosmetic attachments that players can equip on their tanks to showcase achievements, express personality, or add flair to their tanks. From rare rewards to quirky collectibles, each charm tells a story, whether it's earned in fierce tournaments or discovered through limited-time events.

items.name: Alpha Test
items.description: The Alpha Tester Token is a special emblem honoring your innovation and dedication. Carry it as a symbol of your contribution during the alpha testing phase, embodying the spirit of exploration and progress.
items.howto: This charm was awarded to testers who participated in the first Open Alpha playtest.

items.name: Alpha 2 Test
items.description: For those who joined the game at the next stage of its evolution and helped shaping up its future. Our Alpha 2 playtesters, wear this charm as a symbol of the battles for the perfect game we've been through together.
items.howto: This item is available for Alpha 2 playtest participants. Don't want to miss another playtest? Check our Discord for updates!

items.name: Alpha Tournament Medal
items.description: The Tournament Medal Talisman celebrates your tournament participation, symbolizing skill and camaraderie. Carry it as a token of your achievements and a reminder of shared victories.
items.howto: This item could be obtained in our Alpha Tournament. Want more rewards? Check our Discord for upcoming events!

items.name: Alpha Tournament 2 Medal
items.description: The Tournament Medal Talisman celebrates your tournament participation, symbolizing skill and camaraderie. Carry it as a token of your achievements and a reminder of shared victories.
items.howto: This item could be obtained in our Alpha Tournament. Want more rewards? Check our Discord for upcoming events!

items.name: Batmaus

items.name: Battle Tank
items.description: This description was not found in the game and is currently unavailable

items.name: Cactus
items.description: The Cactus charm is a resilient item inspired by a miniature cactus, symbolizing strength and adaptability. Carry it to embrace the spirit of endurance in any situation.

items.name: Citroen DS Phantom
items.description: This description was not found in the game and is currently unavailable

items.name: Ready, Steady... Stand By
items.description: For the stalwart pioneers who stood their ground during Alpha 2 Day 1's technical turbulence: a nostalgic TV test pattern display, frozen in time from when the engines first tried to turn. Your patience didn't go unnoticed - wear it as a badge of honor.
items.howto: This award is granted for taking part in the Alpha 2 launch within the first 3 days.

items.name: Desert Eagles Gold
items.description: The Twin Eagles talisman boosts a striking design, mirroring the iconic Desert Eagle guns. Crafted with precision, this talisman symbolizes strength and duality. Carry it as a token of power, reminding you of the balance between force and control in navigating life's challenges

items.name: Disco Ball
items.description: The Disco Ball charm is a vibrant item that mirrors dancefloor energy. With reflective facets, it radiates dazzling lights, broadcasting the lively spirit of disco wherever you go.

items.name: Buck
items.description: A shimmering emblem adorned with intertwining vines of prosperity and etched with symbols representing financial abundance, radiating wealth, and fortune

items.name: AKSU-74
items.description: The AKSU-74 Talisman is a symbol of resilience and adaptability, inspired by the compact assault rifle renowned for its effectiveness in close-quarters combat. Carry it as a reminder of your ability to navigate challenges with precision and agility, embodying the spirit of resilience in any situation.

items.name: Goldfish
items.description: The Goldfish Aquarium charm is a serene item featuring lively goldfish in a miniature underwater world. Carry it to bring a touch of tranquility and positive energy wherever you go.

items.name: Lodestar Program
items.description: A tribute to the fearless test pilots who push our bleeding-edge tech and most experimental vehicles to their limits. This charm honors your curiosity and persistence - may it light your path to victory.
items.howto: Available exclusively to Lodestar Program members. Ready to join our next testing phase? Join us on Discord!

items.name: Lodestar Program
items.description: A tribute to the fearless test pilots who push our bleeding-edge tech and most experimental vehicles to their limits. This charm honors your curiosity and persistence - may it light your path to victory.
items.howto: Available exclusively to Lodestar Program members. Ready to join our next testing phase? Join us on Discord!

items.name: Maneki Neko
items.description: The Maneki Neko talisman, modeled after the Japanese beckoning cat, brings good fortune and positivity. Carry it for a touch of charm and blessings in your life.

categories.name: Paints
categories.description: Paints are visual skins that let players customize the appearance of their tanks in Project CW. Whether earned through progression, special events, or unlocked achievements, each camouflage pattern reflects a player’s style, status, or tactical flair on the battlefield.

categories.name: Camos
categories.description: Camos are visual skins that let players customize the appearance of their tanks in Project CW. Whether earned through progression, special events, or unlocked achievements, each camouflage pattern reflects a player’s style, status, or tactical flair on the battlefield.

items.name: American Fireball
items.description: A unique all-season camouflage for the American Fireball style.

items.name: Desert Pattern
items.description: Camouflage style for the Soviet design school.

items.name: Czechoslovakian From 1930
items.description: Used until 1939. Yellow and brown spots were applied over dull-green dye. Each vehicle had a unique pattern.

items.name: Wu Xing Element: Wood
items.description: All-season camouflage pattern that commemorates the celebration of the Chinese New Year and represents a Wu Xing element.

categories.name: Tank Skins
categories.description: Tank skins are visual skins tailored to a specific tank, consisting of either recolors or new visual design

categories.name: Agent Skins
categories.description: Agent skins are visual skins tailored to a specific agent, letting them mix & match with their tank camo

items.name: Kent - Steel Blue
items.description: The right shade for the one who knows where those blue-chip targets are.

items.name: Kent - Green Gray
items.description: Green like the money, gray like the suits. The best profits come to those who spot the opportunity.

items.name: Kent - Gold
items.description: Opulence. You have it. Dress like it.

items.name: Kent - Base
items.description: Another day at the office in style: when business casual meets armor casual.

items.name: Chopper - Desert Yellow
items.description: Sun-bleached and battle-tested by desert storms and desert roads.

items.name: Chopper - Desert Green
items.description: Make your presence known with the bold accents of intense green.

items.name: Chopper - Green Scarlet
items.description: Stand out like those scarlet accents and strike hard as a commander who plays by their own rules.

items.name: Chopper - Base
items.description: Classic gear for those who command steel beasts and ride steel horses.

items.name: Jager - Gray
items.description: Fade to gray to stand out as the biggest threat on the battlefield.

items.name: Jager - Orange
items.description: Is that the color of fall leaves back home or a warning sign for danger? You decide.

items.name: Jager - Base
items.description: Get closer to nature. Even closer. Until they won't see what's got them.

categories.name: Tank Classes
categories.description: Project CW features four distinct tank classes, each represented by its own icon. These classes define a vehicle’s role in combat, from heavy front-line bruisers to agile flankers, giving players a variety of tactical options on the battlefield.

categories.name: Medals
categories.description: Medals are prestigious accolades awarded to players for exceptional performance, participation in special events, or long-standing contributions. Each medal is a symbol of honor and skill, proudly displayed as a testament to your journey in Project CW.

items.name: Afterlife
items.description: Eliminated an enemy after your death.
items.howto: Kill an enemy after you die.

items.name: First Blood
items.description: The first elimination of the match was yours!
items.howto: Get the first kill in a match

items.name: King Slayer
items.description: Eliminated the enemy with the highest score.
items.howto: Kill the enemy with the highest score

items.name: Knockout
items.description: Ram an enemy straight to the scrap heap.

items.name: Platoon Wiped
items.description: Defeated three members from the same platoon in one life.
items.howto: Kill all three platoon members in a single life/without dying

items.name: Revenge
items.description: Repaid a debt by eliminating your executioner.
items.howto: Kill the enemy that killed you
